name: Wizard Hop
description:
Made For PPJJGG

      

↓ Scroll Down For Controls ↓

Climb as high as you can in this procedurally generated tower. Collecting orbs and killing enemies rewards you with buffs, but getting hit will punish you with a debuffs.

To avoid falling to your certain doom, try to adapt to your current stats and counter your debuffs with their positive variants.

Remember: Its okay to fail. No mage have been able to understand the tower on their first tries!
